info.title: Project Echo API
info.description:
Project Echo is an IoT-based system designed to record and analyze audio data for species identification and ecosystem monitoring.

    This API provides endpoints to:
    - Upload audio files
    - Simulate audio responses
    - Interface with HMI and audio engine modules

200.description: Get weather data for the day and location provided
Get detection events within certain duration
Get true animal movement data within certain duration
returns the latest simluated movement message

schema.title: Response Checkadmin Hmi Admin Dashboard Post

200.description: returns the running filter algorithm name
Get all users with visit data
Increment user visit count and time
returns the running list of algorithm data

post.description: Generate a 2FA code for a validated user and send it via SMS
Verify a 2FA code and issue a JWT token if valid

get.description: A simple test endpoint to confirm that the public router is loaded successfully.

Provides a public, no-authentication data filtering interface.
Optional query parameters include:
- start_time: float, Unix timestamp (in seconds)
- end_time: float, Unix timestamp (in seconds)
- species: str, species name
- microphone_id: str, sensor ID

Returns data filtered based on the given criteria.

200.description: Get a single node by ID
Update node's last message and connection status
Get sensor settings (sensor-specific or global defaults)
Queue a reboot command (records intent only)
Recent reboot history across all sensors
